text: <@U01BTNDCUBX> initially I was also fairly opinionated on what kind of templates should be included, specifically I tried to remove all the JS crap that are typically shipped with massive themes, but now I'm leaning to what I think Royi is saying: basically people have different tastes and aims and more choice is better; this will hopefully make more people try Franklin and ultimately the whole lot be better for everyone so I'm not against working on (or helping people work on) this template :slightly_smiling_face:
